ui:UiBinder.g:HTMLPanel:
About The Linked Open Data Query Processor (LiDaQ) is a online service which allows users and agents to execute SPARQL queries over the Linked Data Web. LiDaQ is an alternative implementation of the SemanticWebClient Library and SQUIN.
Implementation Details In short, the current code base is available under the GNU GPL v3 licence.
LDSpider - THE Linked Data crawler
ARQ - A SPARQL Processor for Jena
Involved People The whole project benefits from many fruitful discussions with colleagues from DERI (NUIG, Ireland), KIT (University of Karlsruhe, Germany), MPI (University of Saarbrücken, Germany) and the University of Ilmenau, Germany. The current persons are continuously providing input for this project
Jürgen Umbrich - Developer and main contact
Dr. Aidan Hogan
Dr. Andreas Harth
Dr. Axel Polleres - Supervisor
